description.@en: With a flick of a match, a searing bolt of fire dashes towards your foe.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, one foe immediately suffers [[/roll 1D10]]+[WB] in Damage from fire. You can inflict Injuries with this Magick, but they are set On Fire instead.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but your foes are automatically set On Fire.

criticalFailure.@en: The searing bolt transforms into a frigid boomerang of ice, arcing back to strike you instead! As you are struck, you are frozen in place for a number of minutes equal to your [WB] and left Helpless.

reagents.@en: A match, which must be struck (expended)

system.distance: Any one person you can see
